actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

official_title: To amend the Commercial Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1986 to provide that the requirements for the operation of commercial motor vehicles will not apply to the operation of firefighting vehicles.

summary.text: Amends the Commercial Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1986 to exempt from its requirements motor vehicles used solely for fire fighting purposes.

titles.title: To amend the Commercial Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1986 to provide that the requirements for the operation of commercial motor vehicles will not apply to the operation of firefighting vehicles.
